summary: A tongue-in-cheek homage to the rubber puppet monster movies of the 1980's like Critters and Gremlins.
cast: Ron Lipski|Gillian Bellinger|Rich Evans|Mike Stoklasa|Jay Bauman|Mike Johnson|Tina Krause|Jack Packard|Jocelyn Ridgely|Gwendolyn GaBree|Josh Davis|Dixie Jacobs|Anna Miller|Keri Lynn SanFelippo|Katey Senebouttarath|Lora Story|Chris Wade
title: Feeding Frenzy
